home.block: The other technologies and libraries used can be found in the
home.description1: The project is divided into 2 parts, the backend and the frontend.
home.description2: The backend is developed in Symfony 7 and the database uses PostgreSQL.
home.description3: For the frontend was used Vue 3 and Tailwind CSS for the styles.
home.description4: Additionally Docker and Docker Compose are used to assemble and run the projects.
